strapiPost.title: NWA City Receives Recognition For Its Urban Forestry
strapiPost.content:
Being in the Natural State, it only makes sense that an NWA city would be continually recognized and awarded for its urban forest management. 

  • The grantee: Fayetteville received the Tree City USA designation for the 27th consecutive year and the Growth Award for the 8th year in a row. The Growth Award is a recognition of a cityâ€™s urban forest improvements over the previous year. 
  • The grantors: The Tree City USA program is sponsored by the Arbor Day Foundation in partnership with the U.S. Forest Service and the National Association of State Foresters. They grant cities across the U.S. recognition for their care of trees. 

Read the full Fayetteville Flyer story HERE.
